		<style type="text/css" id="wp-custom-css">
			p:last-child {
	margin-bottom: 0;
}

.menu-item-description {
	font-family: 'Nexa Light';
	
}

.hb-menu-item {
	max-width:75%;
}

.hb-menu-item-name {
	font-family: 'Nexa Bold'
}

.elementor-widget-menuitem .hb-icon-wrapper svg {height: 20px;}

.hb-icon-wrapper {
	margin-left: 12px;
}

.elementor-widget-menuitem .hb-icon-wrapper, .hb-menu-item-name {
	display:inline;
}

.menu-item-sizes {
	font-family: 'Nexa Light';
	list-style-type: none;
	padding:0;
	font-size: 14px;
	line-height: 1.5em
}

.hb-menu-item {
	margin-bottom: 10px;
	display: flex;
	align-items: baseline;
}

.hb-menu-item * {
	margin: 0;
	padding: 0;
}

.hb-menu-item .item-price-separator {
	  flex: 1;
	  border-bottom: 2px dotted #23231F;
		margin-left: 2px;
		margin-right: 2px;
}

.wordpress-store-locator-store-in {
	display: none !important;
}

.location_detail-address {
	font-size: 20px;
	font-family: 'Nexa Book';
	font-style: normal;
	line-height: 1.5em;
}

.store_modal_title {
	font-size: 28px !important;
	text-align: center;
	color: #145466;
	line-height: 95%;
	margin-bottom: 15px;
}

.store_locator_search_box {
	padding-top: 40px;
	padding-left: 80px;
	padding-right: 80px;
}

.store_locator_address_field {
	border: 2px solid #145466 !important;
	padding: 15px !important;
	font-size: 20px;
	font-family: 'Nexa Book';
}

.store_locator_details {
	font-size: 18px;
	line-height: 130%;
	font-family: 'Nexa Bold';
}

.store_locator_name {
	color: #145466;
}

.store_locator_result_list_box hr.grey {
	display: none;
}

.store_locator_result_list_item {
	padding-left: 80px;
	padding-right: 80px;
}

.store_locator_details .store_locator_address {
	margin-top: 15px;
	margin-bottom: 12px
}

.store_locator_details .store_locator_contact {
	
}

.store_locator_tel i { font-size:20px; color: #F1CC19;}

.store_locator_visit_website {
	background-color: #f1cc19;
	color: #23231F;
	text-transform:uppercase;
	font-size: 18px;
	padding: 12px 15px 12px 15px;
}

.store_locator_visit_website i {display: none;}

@media screen and (max-width: 575px) {
	.mobile-bg-hidden {
		background-image: none !important;
	}
}

.store_locator_nearest_store_container {
	font-size: 18px;
	line-height: 23px;
	font-family: 'Nexa Bold';
}

.store_locator_nearest_store_location_address, .store_locator_nearest_store_location_phone {
	margin-bottom: 12px;
}

.store_locator_nearest_store_location_careers {
	margin-bottom: 30px;
}

.store_locator_nearest_store_location_careers a {
	color: #009CA6 !important;
	border-bottom: 2px solid #009CA6;
}

.store_locator_nearest_store_container a {
	color: unset;
}

address {
	font-style: normal;
}

.store_locator_nearest_store_location_title a {
	color: #145466;
}
.store_locator_nearest_store_location_website {
	text-align: center;
}

[type=button]:focus, [type=submit]:focus, button:focus {
	outline: none !important;
}

.iq-hide {
	display: none !important;
}

.catering-items {
	list-style-type: none;
	margin: 0;
	padding:0;
}

.catering-items .catering-item {
	margin-bottom: 20px;
}

.catering-item-heat img {
	height:20px;
	margin-left:12px;
}

.catering-item-price {
	float:right;
}

.store_locator_result_list_item {
	padding-left: 30px;
	padding-right: 30px;
}

.store_locator_name {
	display: inline-block;
}

.btn-tertiary {
	text-transform: uppercase;
	border-bottom: 2px solid #387D88;
	color: #387D88;
	font-family: 'Nexa Bold';
	font-size: 18px;
}

.store_locator_details_btn {
	float: right;
}

.store_locator_details {
	font-size: 16px;
	font-family: 'Nexa Book', sans-serif;
}

.store_services_list {
	list-style: none;
	padding:0;
	margin:0;
	font-size: 14px;
	line-height: 18px;
}

.store_services_list > li {
	display: inline-block;
	margin-right: 24px;
}

.store_services_list > li:last-child {
	margin-right: 0;
}

.store_services_list > li i {
	color: #D22630;
	font-size: 12px;
	margin-right: 4px;
}

.store_services_list > li.active i {
	color: #97D700;
}

.store_locator.modal-body {
	padding: 0;
}

.store_locator .store-locator-row {
	margin: 0;
}

.store_locator_search_box {
	padding-top: 40px;
	padding-left: 15px !important;
	padding-right: 15px !important;
}

#store_locator_main, .store-locator-opening-hours div[class^="store-locator-col-"], .store_locator_search_box div[class^="store-locator-col-"], .store_locator_result_list_item {
	padding-left: 0 !important;
	padding-right: 0 !important;
}

.store_locator_address_field_wrapper {
	width: calc(100% - 50px);
}

#store_locator_get_my_position, .store_locator_address_field_wrapper {
	display: inline-block;
}

.store_locator_address_field {
	border: 2px solid #23231F
 	!important;
	padding: 11px 15px !important;
	font-size: 20px;
	font-family: 'Nexa Book';
	border-radius: 4px !important;
}

.store_locator_address_field_icon {
	position: absolute;
    right: 62px;
    top: 12px;
}

#store_locator_get_my_position {
	margin: 0;
    margin-top: 4px;
    position: absolute;
    right: 0;
    top: 50%;
    transform: translateY(-50%);
}

.store_locator_result_list_title {
	margin-top:40px;
	margin-bottom: 0;
}

.store_locator_result_list_item {
	padding-top: 24px;
	padding-bottom: 24px;
}

.store_locator_result_list_item:hover {
	background-color: unset;
	cursor: auto;
}

.store_locator_details {
	padding: 0;
}

.store-details-location i {
	font-size: 22px;
	color: #f1cc19;
	width: 22px;
}

#store_locator > .store-locator-row:first-child {
	display: flex;
	flex-direction: column;
}

#store_locator_sidebar {
	order: 2;
}

#store_locator_main {
	order: 1;
}

@media screen and (min-width: 768px) {
	#store_locator > .store-locator-row:first-child {
		flex-direction: row;
	}
	
	#store_locator_sidebar {
		order: 1;
	}

	#store_locator_main {
		order: 2;
	}
}


@media screen and (max-width:767px) {
#store_locator_map {
    height: 320px !important;
}	
}

<style>
.hamburger {
  padding: 10px 10px 3px ;
  display: inline-block;
  cursor: pointer;
  transition-property: opacity, filter;
  transition-duration: 0.15s;
  transition-timing-function: linear;
  font: inherit;
  color: inherit;
  text-transform: none;
  background-color: transparent;
  border: 0;
  margin: 0;
  overflow: visible; 
z-index:99999;}
  .hamburger:hover {
    opacity: 1; }
  .hamburger.is-active:hover {
    opacity: 1; }
  .hamburger.is-active .hamburger-inner,
  .hamburger.is-active .hamburger-inner::before,
  .hamburger.is-active .hamburger-inner::after {
    background-color: #fff; }

.hamburger:hover, .hamburger:focus{
    background: unset;
    outline: unset;
  }

.hamburger-box {
  width: 40px;
  height: 24px;
  display: inline-block;
  position: relative; }

.hamburger-inner {
  display: block;
  top: 50%;
  margin-top: -2px; }
  .hamburger-inner, .hamburger-inner::before, .hamburger-inner::after {
    width: 40px;
    height: 4px;
    background-color: #fff;
    border-radius: 4px;
    position: absolute;
    transition-property: transform;
    transition-duration: 0.15s;
    transition-timing-function: ease; }
  .hamburger-inner::before, .hamburger-inner::after {
    content: "";
    display: block; }
  .hamburger-inner::before {
    top: -10px; }
  .hamburger-inner::after {
    bottom: -10px; }

/*
   * Elastic
   */
.hamburger--elastic .hamburger-inner {
  top: 2px;
  transition-duration: 0.275s;
  transition-timing-function: cubic-bezier(0.68, -0.55, 0.265, 1.55); }
